add_token_modal.title: Execute Add?
app_crashed.description: Something went wrong but our developers have been alerted. Your funds are safe. If you have ongoing interactions you can resume them from where you left off.
app_crashed.title: Oh snap!
collectibles_page.title: Collectibles
evm_error.balance_not_enough_to_complete: Existential deposit error. Your account does not have the required minimum balance of its native token to complete the swap.
evm_error.transfer_already_completed: Transfer already completed. Try refreshing the page.
evm_error.transfer_amount_exceeds_allowa: Transfer amount exceeds allowance. Please try again.
general.action_on_error_cannot_found_poo: Try changing the network in the upper right corner.
Try adjusting your filter. (Are you on the right network?)
general.amount_of_tokens_less_than_zero: Amount must be greater than or equal to zero
general.cannot_confirm_transfer_vaa_erro: Could not confirm transfer with Wormhole guardians. This usually happens when the source blockchain is congested. Please try again later.
general.created_spl_token_account_but_fa: Successfully created SPL token account but failed to fetch it
general.internal_vaa_error: Something went wrong, please contact Swim support.
general.low_balance_in_following_wallets: You have a low balance in the following wallets, and may not be able to cover all of the required transaction fees:
general.low_polkadot_balance_warning: *Polkadot chains require a minimum balance in order not to be deactivated according to Existential Deposit requirements.
general.mobile_device_disclaimer_descrip: While most features should work, please note that we optimized the cross-chain experience for desktop devices.
general.one_or_more_transaction_not_conf: One or more transactions did not confirm
general.require_a_valid_max_slippage_set: Provide a valid max slippage setting
general.require_non_empty_balance_in_spe: Empty balance in {{ecosystemName}} wallet. You will need some funds to pay for transaction fees.
general.require_some_balance_in_solana_w: Low SOL in Solana wallet. You will need up to ~{{minimumFee}} SOL to pay for network fees.
general.transaction_not_confirmed_error: Transaction with ID {{txId}} did not confirm
general.unreachable_vaa_error: We are unable to reach the Wormhole guardians. Please try again later.
help_page.discord_description: Join our community on Discord to get quick help from developers and the community.
help_page.documentation_description: We have a quickly growing collection of troubleshooting articles and tutorials in our GitBook. If you cannot find the answer you are looking for there, feel free to ask your question in our Discord or Telegram communities.
help_page.telegram_description: Join our Telegram group to stay up to date and get help from developers and the community.
home_page.amm_style_bridge_description: Swim’s novel cross-chain stableswap approach to a bridge design makes bridging as easy as trading in a stable swap pool. Users can bridge easier by only using native assets, native gas tokens & wallets while still having all the benefits of Wormhole speed and decentralization.
home_page.audit_description: Learn about the Security Assessment for Swim Pool by Kudelski Security.
home_page.bridging_a_multi_chain_world_d: DeFi has become a fragmented multi-chain universe. Solana ecosystem growth has been stunted due to barriers of entry and a lack of user-friendly bridges. Leveraging Wormhole technology and Solana’s scalability, Swim connects capital seamlessly between networks.
home_page.bug_bounty_program_description: We offer up to {{bountyAmount}} to incentivize ethical hackers to search for security vulnerabilities in the protocol.
home_page.core_building_block_descriptio: Positioning ourselves as a DeFi primitive in the Solana and crosschain ecosystem, Swim aims to act as the first point of contact for new Solana users, at the same time creating a fundamental building block in the multichain world.
home_page.dive_in_our_features_descripti: Bridging as easy as stableswap trading. Swim across our liquidity pools from chain to chain.
home_page.dynamic_rates_description: Natural market incentives balance liquidity ratios.
home_page.long_introduction: Swim provides a simple way to transfer tokens across chains via multi-token liquidity pools and Solana’s Wormhole. No more delays, centralized bridges, or wrapped assets.
home_page.multi_wallet_compatible_descri: See your balances across several chains.
home_page.native_assets_description: No more bridge-wrapped assets — swap, send, and receive native assets.
media_page.learn_more_on_the_team: Learn more about our vision, product and team
multi_wallet_modal.see_supported_chains_: See the supported chains of the {{protocolName}} protocol
multi_wallet_modal.title: Connect Wallets
new_version_alert.description: There is a new version of the app available. Please reload the page to continue using the app.
new_version_alert.title: New version available
notify.burn_all_lp_tokens_error_descript: You are the only LP token holder. Please use the proportional remove method or select a lower burn percentage.
notify.could_not_fetch_pool_lp_amount_er: Could not fetch pool LP amount
notify.unexpected_form_error_description: There was an unexpected error submitting the form. Developers were notified.
pool_page.pool_price_explanation: This pool uses a constant product curve, prices deviate from 1:1.
pool_paused_alert.description: The required pool is currently paused. Please try again later.
pool_paused_alert.title: Pool Paused
product_roadmap.2022_q3_deliverables:
Seamless single-click swapping
Integrating with other projects
Expanding to new chains
product_roadmap.2022_q4_deliverables:
Multi-chain native asset SDK
Numerous UX enhancements
Community Initiatives
recent_interactions.complete_transfer_an: Complete transfer and claim token on Solana
recent_interactions.disconnected_with_wa: Connect your wallets to see recent interactions.
recent_interactions.ethereum_waiting_tim: Please note that waiting for Ethereum block confirmations may take a long time. Finality requires up to around {{confirmations}} confirmations or about {{minutes}} minutes.
recent_interactions.interactions_not_fou: Interactions are stored per browser. If you used incognito mode, they will not show up here.
recent_interactions.polygon_waiting_time: Please note that waiting for Polygon block confirmations may take a long time. Finality requires {{confirmations}} confirmations or about {{minutes}} minutes.
remove_token_form.burnt_most_lp_tokens_e: You are the last person to remove. Please use the proportional remove method.
remove_token_form.lp_tokens_explanation: The estimated LP tokens needed (including slippage) will be transferred from {{tokenName}} to Solana, and any unused tokens will remain in your LP token account on Solana.
remove_token_form.require_at_least_one_o: Enter at least one output amount
remove_token_form.require_burn_percentag: Set the burn percentage to greater than zero
remove_token_form.require_enough_lp_toke: You do not have enough LP tokens
remove_token_form.require_lp_tokens: You do not have any LP tokens on {{ecosystemName}}
remove_token_modal.title: Execute Remove?
security_page.encourage_the_community_to: We value the work done by security researchers. We are committed to working with this community to verify, reproduce, and respond to legitimate reported vulnerabilities. We encourage the community to participate in our responsible reporting process.
security_page.how_to_report_security_vul: If you are a security researcher and would like to report a security vulnerability, please send an email to: {{email}}. Please provide your name, contact information, and company name (if applicable) with each report.
security_page.report_via_immunefi: You may also report vulnerabilities through our bug bounty program on Immunefi.
security_page.responsible_disclosure_gui: Provide details of the vulnerability, including information needed to reproduce and validate the vulnerability and a Proof of Concept (POC)
Make a good faith effort to avoid privacy violations, destruction of data and interruption or degradation of our services
Do not modify or access data that does not belong to you
Give us a reasonable time to correct the issue before making any information public

To encourage responsible reporting, we commit that we will not take legal action against you or ask law enforcement to investigate you if you comply with the following Responsible Disclosure Guidelines:
security_page.title: Security Policy
single_wallet_modal.title: Select Wallet
slippage_button.title: Slippage tolerance
solana_error.completed_with_the_specifie: The instruction could not be completed with the specified slippage settings.
solana_error.transaction_cannot_reach_ch: The transaction did not reach the Solana blockchain in time. This might be because you took too long to approve the transaction or because the network is congested. Additional info: {{errorMessage}}
solana_error.unknown_signer: Unknown signer. This is likely because you switched accounts in your wallet. Refresh the page and try again.
solana_tps_warning.network_congested_des: Solana’s Transactions Per Second is low ({{tps}} TPS), causing network congestion. Please proceed with caution as transactions may take a long time to confirm.
solana_tps_warning.network_down_descript: We've detected downtime on the Solana Network and thus advise against swapping at this time.
swap_form.require_swap_size_must_be_less: Swap size must be less than {{percentage}}% of pool supply
swap_form.require_warning_gas_fee_may_be: The Ethereum gas fees might be high relative to the swap amount.
swap_form.require_warning_swap_too_large: You're trying to swap >{{percentage}}% of the pool size which may impact the price.

vaa_error.transfer_not_detected: Transfer not detected by Wormhole guardians. This usually happens when the network is congested. Please retry later.
